title: Transparent Screen PRO v2.2[DELTA1001]
description:
Transparent Screen PRO
Version:2.2

You want to use your phone while you're walking? Make your screen transparent!
This app gives you the opportunity to use your phone as usual, while being able to see the image of your camera transparently on the entire screen.

Pro features:

No Ads (the internet permission is not anymore needed)
Widget
Use the camera LED

What's in this version : (Updated : Aug 9, 2013)

the option "take pictures during transparency" now takes a photo every X seconds
added a "show picture folder" button
Facebook button works again (go on and like it now :D)
small usability adjustments
several bugs were fixed

Required Android O/S : 2.2+

Installation Instruction:
1)Copy the file to SD Card
2)Open and install it
3)Enjoy
